    • createSession

      public Map<String,Object> createSession()
      Calls a SPROC to create a session. See more information in SessionRoom NamedStoredProcedureQuery and in SessionRepository interface.
      Specified by:
      createSession in interface SessionServiceInterface
      Returns:
      Result set from Stored Procedure Call CREATE_SESSION

    • joinSession

      public Map<String,Long> joinSession(String password)
      Calls two stored procedures to join a session: 1. One that retrieves the correct Session ID from a provided password. If sessionID = 0, the session does not exist. 2. Joins a user into the found session.
      Specified by:
      joinSession in interface SessionServiceInterface
      Returns:
      Specific columns from the result set of Stored Procedure Call JOIN_SESSION
